title: Calories in a Slurpee
meta_description: Discover calories in a slurpee, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition for a medium serving, plus variations and FAQs.
assumptions: Medium 16 oz (473 ml) cherry Slurpee from 7-Eleven; standard formula, no add-ins.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, flavor, brand, and customizations. Check store info or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A medium Slurpee has about 240 kcal, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Small size (12 oz) instead of medium
Large size (22 oz) instead of medium

faqs.q: How many calories in a medium Slurpee?
faqs.a: About 240 kcal for a 16 oz cherry Slurpee.
Yes, a medium has around 60 g of sugars from the syrup.

faqs.q: Calories in a blue raspberry Slurpee?
faqs.a: Similar to cherry, about 240 kcal for medium size.
Yes—small (12 oz) ≈160 kcal, large (22 oz) ≈340 kcal.

faqs.q: Any protein or fat in a Slurpee?
faqs.a: Negligible: 0 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.
